trans-unit.source: Assigning to a symbol and its member (field/property) in the same statement is not recommended. trans-unit.source: Do not declare virtual events in a base class. Overridden events in a derived class have undefined behavior. The C# compiler does not handle this correctly and it is unpredictable whether a subscriber to the derived event will actually be subscribing to the base class event.

trans-unit.source: For reference types, the default implementation of the equality operator is almost always correct. By default, two references are equal only if they point to the same object. trans-unit.source: Event names should describe the action that raises the event. To name related events that are raised in a specific sequence, use the present or past tense to indicate the relative position in the sequence of actions. For example, when naming a pair of events that is raised when closing a resource, you might name it 'Closing' and 'Closed', instead of 'BeforeClose' and 'AfterClose'.

trans-unit.source: A class declares and implements an instance field that is a System.IDisposable type, and the class does not implement IDisposable. A class that declares an IDisposable field indirectly owns an unmanaged resource and should implement the IDisposable interface.

trans-unit.source: Enums should have zero value
trans-unit.target: 枚举应具有零值

trans-unit.source: The default value of an uninitialized enumeration, just as other value types, is zero. A nonflags-attributed enumeration should define a member by using the value of zero so that the default value is a valid value of the enumeration. If an enumeration that has the FlagsAttribute attribute applied defines a zero-valued member, its name should be ""None"" to indicate that no values have been set in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 与其他值类型一样，未初始化的枚举的默认值为零。无标记、带属性的枚举应使用零值来定义成员，使默认值为枚举的有效值。如果应用 FlagsAttribute 属性的枚举定义了一个零值成员，该枚举的名称应为 "None"，指示尚未在枚举中设置任何值。

trans-unit.target: 将一个值为零且建议名称为 "None" 的成员添加到 {0} 中

trans-unit.source: Abstract types should not have public constructors
trans-unit.target: 抽象类型不应具有公共构造函数

trans-unit.source: Constructors on abstract types can be called only by derived types. Because public constructors create instances of a type, and you cannot create instances of an abstract type, an abstract type that has a public constructor is incorrectly designed.
trans-unit.target: 抽象类型的构造函数只能由派生类型调用。由于公共构造函数创建某一类型的实例，而你不能创建抽象类型的实例，因此具有公共构造函数的抽象类型的设计是错误的。

trans-unit.source: Abstract type '{0}' should not have public constructors
trans-unit.target: 抽象类型 {0} 不应具有公共构造函数

trans-unit.source: Mark assemblies with CLSCompliant
trans-unit.target: 用 CLSCompliant 标记程序集

trans-unit.source: The Common Language Specification (CLS) defines naming restrictions, data types, and rules to which assemblies must conform if they will be used across programming languages. Good design dictates that all assemblies explicitly indicate CLS compliance by using CLSCompliantAttribute . If this attribute is not present on an assembly, the assembly is not compliant.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言规范 (CLS) 定义命名限制、数据类型和跨编程语言使用程序集时程序集必须遵循的规则。好的设计要求所有程序集使用 CLSCompliantAttribute 显式指示 CLS 符合性。如果程序集上不存在此属性，则程序集不符合。

trans-unit.source: Mark assemblies with CLSCompliant
trans-unit.target: 用 CLSCompliant 标记程序集

trans-unit.source: Mark assemblies with assembly version
trans-unit.target: 用程序集版本标记程序集

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework uses the version number to uniquely identify an assembly, and to bind to types in strongly named assemblies. The version number is used together with version and publisher policy. By default, applications run only with the assembly version with which they were built.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 使用版本号来唯一标识程序集，并绑定到强命名程序集中的类型。版本号与版本和发布服务器策略一起使用。默认情况下，应用程序只与生成它们的程序集版本一起运行。

trans-unit.source: Mark assemblies with assembly version
trans-unit.target: 用程序集版本标记程序集

trans-unit.source: Mark assemblies with ComVisible
trans-unit.target: 用 ComVisible 标记程序集

trans-unit.source: ComVisibleAttribute determines how COM clients access managed code. Good design dictates that assemblies explicitly indicate COM visibility. COM visibility can be set for the whole assembly and then overridden for individual types and type members. If this attribute is not present, the contents of the assembly are visible to COM clients.
trans-unit.target: ComVisibleAttribute 确定 COM 客户端访问托管代码的方法。好的设计要求程序集显式指示 COM 可见性。可为整个程序集设置 COM 可见性，然后为单个类型和类型成员重写。如果此属性不存在，则程序集的内容对 COM 客户端可见。

trans-unit.source: Make '{0}' sealed (a breaking change if this class has previously shipped), implement the method non-explicitly, or implement a new method that exposes the functionality of '{1}' and is visible to derived classes

trans-unit.source: Override methods on comparable types
trans-unit.target: 重写可比较类型中的方法

trans-unit.source: A public or protected type implements the System.IComparable interface. It does not override Object.Equals nor does it overload the language-specific operator for equality, inequality, less than, less than or equal, greater than or greater than or equal.
trans-unit.target: 公共类型或受保护的类型实现 System.IComparable 接口。它不重写 Object.Equals，也不重载用于等式、不等式、小于、小于等于、大于或大于等于的语言特定的运算符。

trans-unit.source: {0} should override Equals since it implements IComparable
trans-unit.target: 由于 {0} 实现 IComparable，因此，它应重写等于运算符

trans-unit.source: {0} should define operator(s) '{1}' since it implements IComparable
trans-unit.target: 由于 {0} 实现 IComparable，因此它应定义“{1}”运算符

trans-unit.source: Move pinvokes to native methods class
trans-unit.target: 将 pinvoke 移到本机方法类

trans-unit.source: Platform Invocation methods, such as those that are marked by using the System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute attribute, or methods that are defined by using the Declare keyword in Visual Basic, access unmanaged code. These methods should be of the NativeMethods, SafeNativeMethods, or UnsafeNativeMethods class.
trans-unit.target: 平台调用方法(例如，使用 System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute 属性标记的方法)，或在 Visual Basic 中使用 Declare 关键字定义的方法，它们均访问非托管代码。这些方法应为 NativeMethods、SafeNativeMethods 或 UnsafeNativeMethods 类。

trans-unit.source: Move pinvokes to native methods class
trans-unit.target: 将 pinvoke 移到本机方法类

trans-unit.source: Identifiers should differ by more than case
trans-unit.target: 标识符应以大小写之外的差别进行区分

trans-unit.source: Identifiers for namespaces, types, members, and parameters cannot differ only by case because languages that target the common language runtime are not required to be case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 只通过大小写无法区分命名空间、类型、成员和参数的标识符，因为目标为公共语言运行时的语言不需要区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Names of '{0}' and '{1}' should differ by more than case
trans-unit.target: “{0}”和“{1}”名称应以大小写之外的差别进行区分

trans-unit.source: Identifiers should have correct prefix
trans-unit.target: 标识符应具有正确的前缀

trans-unit.source: The name of an externally visible interface does not start with an uppercase ""I"". The name of a generic type parameter on an externally visible type or method does not start with an uppercase ""T"".
trans-unit.target: 外部可见的接口的名称不以大写字母 "I" 开头。外部可见的类型或方法上的泛型类型参数的名称不以大写字母 "T" 开头。

trans-unit.source: Prefix interface name {0} with 'I'
trans-unit.target: 为接口名称 {0} 加上前缀 "I"

trans-unit.source: Prefix generic type parameter name {0} with 'T'
trans-unit.target: 为泛型类型参数名称 {0} 加上前缀 "T"

trans-unit.source: Non-constant fields should not be visible
trans-unit.target: 非常量字段应当不可见

trans-unit.source: Static fields that are neither constants nor read-only are not thread-safe. Access to such a field must be carefully controlled and requires advanced programming techniques to synchronize access to the class object.
trans-unit.target: 既不是常量也不是只读的静态字段不是线程安全的字段。必须谨慎控制对此类字段的访问，并且需要高级编程技术来同步对类对象的访问。

trans-unit.source: Non-constant fields should not be visible
trans-unit.target: 非常量字段应当不可见

trans-unit.source: Do not mark enums with FlagsAttribute
trans-unit.target: 不要使用 FlagsAttribute 标记枚举

trans-unit.source: An externally visible enumeration is marked by using FlagsAttribute, and it has one or more values that are not powers of two or a combination of the other defined values on the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 外部可见的枚举通过 FlagsAttribute 标记，并且它的一个或多个值不是 2 的幂或枚举上定义的其他值的组合。

trans-unit.source: Do not mark enums with FlagsAttribute
trans-unit.target: 不要使用 FlagsAttribute 标记枚举

trans-unit.source: Operator overloads have named alternates
trans-unit.target: 运算符重载具有命名的备用项

trans-unit.source: An operator overload was detected, and the expected named alternative method was not found. The named alternative member provides access to the same functionality as the operator and is provided for developers who program in languages that do not support overloaded operators.
trans-unit.target: 检测到运算符重载，但未找到预期的命名备用方法。命名备选成员提供对与运算符相同的功能的访问，并供以不支持重载运算符的语言编程的开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Provide a method named '{0}' as a friendly alternate for operator {1}
trans-unit.target: 提供名为“{0}”的方法作为运算符 {1} 的友好备用项

trans-unit.source: Provide a property named '{0}' as a friendly alternate for operator {1}
trans-unit.target: 提供名为“{0}”的属性作为运算符 {1} 的友好备用项

trans-unit.source: Provide a method named '{0}' or '{1}' as an alternate for operator {2}
trans-unit.target: 提供名为“{0}”或“{1}”的方法作为运算符 {2} 的备用项

trans-unit.source: Mark {0} as public because it is a friendly alternate for operator {1}
trans-unit.target: 将 {0} 标记为 public，因为它是运算符 {1} 的友好备用项

trans-unit.source: Operators should have symmetrical overloads
trans-unit.target: 运算符应有对称重载

trans-unit.source: A type implements the equality or inequality operator and does not implement the opposite operator.
trans-unit.target: 类型实现相等运算符或不相等运算符，但不实现相反运算符。

trans-unit.source: Collection properties should be read only
trans-unit.target: 集合属性应为只读

trans-unit.source: A writable collection property allows a user to replace the collection with a different collection. A read-only property stops the collection from being replaced but still allows the individual members to be set.
trans-unit.target: 通过可写集合属性，用户可将集合替换为不同集合。只读属性阻止替换集合，但仍允许设置单个成员。

trans-unit.source: Change '{0}' to be read-only by removing the property setter
trans-unit.target: 通过移除属性 setter 将“{0}”更改为只读

trans-unit.source: Overload operator equals on overriding value type Equals
trans-unit.target: 重写值类型的 Equals 方法时应重载相等运算符

trans-unit.source: In most programming languages there is no default implementation of the equality operator (==) for value types. If your programming language supports operator overloads, you should consider implementing the equality operator. Its behavior should be identical to that of Equals.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数编程语言中，对于值类型并无相等运算符 (==) 的默认实现。如果编程语言支持运算符重载，则应考虑实现相等运算符。其行为应与 Equals 相同。

trans-unit.source: Implement the equality operators and make their behavior identical to that of the Equals method
trans-unit.target: 实现相等运算符，并使其行为与 Equals 方法的行为相同

trans-unit.source: Pass system uri objects instead of strings
trans-unit.target: 传递系统 URI 对象而不是字符串

trans-unit.source: A call is made to a method that has a string parameter whose name contains "uri", "URI", "urn", "URN", "url", or "URL". The declaring type of the method contains a corresponding method overload that has a System.Uri parameter.
trans-unit.target: 已调用具有字符串参数的方法，该字符串参数的名称包含 "uri"、"URI"、"urn"、"URN"、"url" 或 "URL"。该方法的声明类型包含一个具有 System.Uri 参数的相应方法重载。

trans-unit.source: Modify '{0}' to call '{1}' instead of '{2}'
Implement IEquatable when overriding Object.Equals
trans-unit.target: 重写 Object.Equals 时实现 IEquatable

trans-unit.source: Type {0} should implement IEquatable<T> because it overrides Equals
trans-unit.target: 类型 {0} 应实现 IEquatable<T> ，因为它将替代 Equals

trans-unit.source: CancellationToken parameters must come last
trans-unit.target: CancellationToken 参数必须最后出现

trans-unit.source: Method '{0}' should take CancellationToken as the last parameter
trans-unit.target: 方法“{0}”应将 CancellationToken 作为最后一个参数

trans-unit.source: Identifier contains type name
trans-unit.target: 标识符包含类型名称

trans-unit.source: Names of parameters and members are better used to communicate their meaning than to describe their type, which is expected to be provided by development tools. For names of members, if a data type name must be used, use a language-independent name instead of a language-specific one.
trans-unit.target: 参数和成员的名称用于交流其意义优于用于描述其类型，该类型预期由开发工具提供。对于成员的名称，如果必须使用数据类型名称，请使用与语言无关的名称，而不要使用语言特定的名称。

trans-unit.source: Identifier '{0}' contains type name
trans-unit.target: 标识符“{0}”包含类型名称

trans-unit.source: Create a property accessor.
trans-unit.target: 创建属性访问器。

trans-unit.target: 使属性 getter 公开

trans-unit.target: 使属性 setter 不公开

trans-unit.target: 因为 {0} 公开外部可见的类型，请在程序集级别使用 ComVisible(false) 来标记它，然后使用 ComVisible(true) 来标记该程序集内应当向 COM 客户端公开的所有类型

trans-unit.source: Consider changing the ComVisible attribute on {0} to false, and opting in at the type level
trans-unit.target: 考虑将 {0} 的 ComVisible 属性改为 false，然后在类型级别进行选择

trans-unit.target: 实现相等和比较方法和运算符

trans-unit.target: 实现 IEquatable

trans-unit.target: 实现 IDisposable 接口

trans-unit.source: Remove FlagsAttribute from enum.
trans-unit.target: 从枚举中删除 FlagsAttribute。

trans-unit.target: 向枚举应用 FlagsAttribute。

trans-unit.source: Remove all members that have the value zero except for one member that is named 'None'.
trans-unit.target: 删除所有值为零的成员(名为 "None" 的成员除外)。

trans-unit.source: Rename zero-valued enum field to 'None'.
trans-unit.target: 将值为零的枚举字段重命名为 "None"。

trans-unit.target: 向枚举添加值为零的成员 "None"。

trans-unit.source: Change the accessibility of public constructors to protected.
trans-unit.target: 将公共构造函数的可访问性更改为受保护。

trans-unit.source: Do not declare static members on generic types
trans-unit.target: 不要在泛型类型中声明静态成员

trans-unit.source: When a static member of a generic type is called, the type argument must be specified for the type. When a generic instance member that does not support inference is called, the type argument must be specified for the member. In these two cases, the syntax for specifying the type argument is different and easily confused.
trans-unit.target: 调用泛型类型的静态成员时，必须为该类型指定类型参数。调用不支持推断的泛型实例成员时，必须为该成员指定类型参数。在这两种情况下，用于指定类型参数的语法不同且容易混淆。

trans-unit.source: Do not declare static members on generic types
trans-unit.target: 不要在泛型类型中声明静态成员

trans-unit.source: Generic interface should also be implemented
trans-unit.target: 还应实现泛型接口

trans-unit.source: To broaden the usability of a type, implement one of the generic interfaces. This is especially true for collections as they can then be used to populate generic collection types.
trans-unit.target: 若要扩大类型的可用性，请实现其中一个泛型接口。对于集合尤其如此，因为它们随后可用于填充泛型集合类型。

trans-unit.source: Type '{0}' directly or indirectly inherits '{1}' without implementing '{2}'. Publicly-visible types should implement the generic version to broaden usability.
trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”直接或间接继承“{1}”，而不实现“{2}”。公共可见的类型应实现通用版本以扩大可用性。

trans-unit.source: Enum Storage should be Int32
trans-unit.target: 枚举存储应为 Int32

trans-unit.source: An enumeration is a value type that defines a set of related named constants. By default, the System.Int32 data type is used to store the constant value. Although you can change this underlying type, it is not required or recommended for most scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 枚举是一种值类型，它定义一组相关的命名常量。默认情况下，System.Int32 数据类型用于存储常量值。虽然你可以更改此基础类型，但在大多情况下，不需要或不建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: If possible, make the underlying type of {0} System.Int32 instead of {1}
trans-unit.target: 如有可能，请将 {0} 的基础类型设为 System.Int32，而不是 {1}

trans-unit.source: Use events where appropriate
trans-unit.target: 在适用处使用事件

trans-unit.source: This rule detects methods that have names that ordinarily would be used for events. If a method is called in response to a clearly defined state change, the method should be invoked by an event handler. Objects that call the method should raise events instead of calling the method directly.
trans-unit.target: 此规则检测具有通常用于事件的名称的方法。如果调用某一方法来响应明确定义的状态更改，此方法应由事件处理程序调用。调用方法的对象应引发事件，而不是直接调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Consider making '{0}' an event
trans-unit.target: 考虑将“{0}”设置为事件

trans-unit.source: Implement standard exception constructors
trans-unit.target: 实现标准异常构造函数

trans-unit.source: Failure to provide the full set of constructors can make it difficult to correctly handle exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 未能提供完整的构造函数集会导致难以正确处理异常。

trans-unit.source: Add the following constructor to {0}: {1}
trans-unit.target: 将下列构造函数添加到 {0}: {1}

trans-unit.source: Nested types should not be visible
trans-unit.target: 嵌套类型应不可见

trans-unit.source: A nested type is a type that is declared in the scope of another type. Nested types are useful to encapsulate private implementation details of the containing type. Used for this purpose, nested types should not be externally visible.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套类型是在另一种类型的范围内声明的类型。嵌套类型对于封装包含类型的私有实现详细信息非常有用。出于此目的，嵌套类型不应在外部可见。

trans-unit.source: Do not nest type {0}. Alternatively, change its accessibility so that it is not externally visible.
trans-unit.target: 不要嵌套类型 {0}。或者，更改其可访问性，使它在外部不可见。

trans-unit.source: Do not nest type {0}. Alternatively, change its accessibility so that it is not externally visible. If this type is defined in a Visual Basic Module, it will be considered a nested type to other .NET languages. In that case, consider moving the type outside of the Module.
trans-unit.target: 不要嵌套类型 {0}。或者，更改其可访问性，使它在外部不可见。如果此类型是在 Visual Basic 模块中定义的，则其他 .NET 语言会将其视为嵌套类型。在这种情况下，请考虑将该类型移出 Visual Basic 模块。

trans-unit.source: Avoid empty interfaces
trans-unit.target: 避免使用空接口

trans-unit.source: Interfaces define members that provide a behavior or usage contract. The functionality that is described by the interface can be adopted by any type, regardless of where the type appears in the inheritance hierarchy. A type implements an interface by providing implementations for the members of the interface. An empty interface does not define any members; therefore, it does not define a contract that can be implemented.
trans-unit.target: 接口定义提供行为或使用协定的成员。接口所描述的功能可由任何类型采用，而不管该类型在继承层次结构中的何处出现。类型通过提供接口成员的实现来实现接口。空接口不定义任何成员；因此，它不定义可以实现的协定。

trans-unit.source: Avoid empty interfaces
trans-unit.target: 避免使用空接口

trans-unit.source: Provide ObsoleteAttribute message
trans-unit.target: 提供 ObsoleteAttribute 消息

trans-unit.source: A type or member is marked by using a System.ObsoleteAttribute attribute that does not have its ObsoleteAttribute.Message property specified. When a type or member that is marked by using ObsoleteAttribute is compiled, the Message property of the attribute is displayed. This gives the user information about the obsolete type or member.
trans-unit.target: 使用 System.ObsoleteAttribute 特性标记类型或成员，该特性的 ObsoleteAttribute.Message 属性尚未指定。编译使用 ObsoleteAttribute 标记的类型或成员时，将显示该特性的消息属性。这为用户提供有关过时的类型或成员的信息。

trans-unit.source: Provide a message for the ObsoleteAttribute that marks {0} as Obsolete
trans-unit.target: 为将 {0} 标记为过时的 ObsoleteAttribute 提供消息

trans-unit.source: Properties should not be write only
trans-unit.target: 属性不应是只写的

trans-unit.source: Although it is acceptable and often necessary to have a read-only property, the design guidelines prohibit the use of write-only properties. This is because letting a user set a value, and then preventing the user from viewing that value, does not provide any security. Also, without read access, the state of shared objects cannot be viewed, which limits their usefulness.
trans-unit.target: 虽然具有只读属性是可接受的，且常常是必需的，但设计指南禁止使用只写属性。这是因为让用户设置一个值，然后阻止用户查看该值，这种做法不安全。另外，如果没有读取访问权限，则不能查看共享对象的状态，这会限制对这些对象的作用。

trans-unit.source: Because property {0} is write-only, either add a property getter with an accessibility that is greater than or equal to its setter or convert this property into a method
trans-unit.target: 由于属性 {0} 是只写的，因此，要么添加一个可访问性高于或等于 setter 的 getter 属性，要么将该属性转换为方法

trans-unit.source: Because the property getter for {0} is less visible than its setter, either increase the accessibility of its getter or decrease the accessibility of its setter
trans-unit.target: 由于 {0} 的属性 getter 的可见性低于 setter，因此，要么提高 getter 的可访问性，要么降低 getter 的可访问性

trans-unit.source: Declare types in namespaces
trans-unit.target: 在命名空间中声明类型

trans-unit.source: Types are declared in namespaces to prevent name collisions and as a way to organize related types in an object hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在命名空间中声明类型以防止名称冲突，并作为一种组织对象层次结构中相关类型的方式。

trans-unit.source: Declare types in namespaces
trans-unit.target: 在命名空间中声明类型

trans-unit.source: Do not declare visible instance fields
trans-unit.target: 不要声明可见实例字段

trans-unit.source: The primary use of a field should be as an implementation detail. Fields should be private or internal and should be exposed by using properties.
trans-unit.target: 字段应主要用作实现详细信息。字段应为私有字段或内部字段，并且应使用属性来公开。

trans-unit.source: Do not declare visible instance fields
trans-unit.target: 不要声明可见实例字段

trans-unit.source: URI-like parameters should not be strings
trans-unit.target: 类 URI 参数不应为字符串

trans-unit.source: This rule assumes that the parameter represents a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). A string representation or a URI is prone to parsing and encoding errors, and can lead to security vulnerabilities. 'System.Uri' class provides these services in a safe and secure manner.
trans-unit.target: 此规则假定参数表示统一资源标识符(URI)。字符串表示形式或 URI 易解析且易出现编码错误，并可能导致安全漏洞。"System.Uri" 类以安全可靠方式提供这些服务。

trans-unit.source: Change the type of parameter '{0}' of method '{1}' from 'string' to 'System.Uri', or provide an overload to '{1}' that allows '{0}' to be passed as a 'System.Uri' object
trans-unit.target: 将方法“{1}”的参数“{0}”的类型从 "string" 改为 "System.Uri"，或者提供“{1}”的重载，允许将“{0}”作为 "System.Uri" 对象来传递

trans-unit.source: URI-like return values should not be strings
trans-unit.target: 类 URI 返回值不应是字符串

trans-unit.source: This rule assumes that the method returns a URI. A string representation of a URI is prone to parsing and encoding errors, and can lead to security vulnerabilities. The System.Uri class provides these services in a safe and secure manner.
trans-unit.target: 此规则假定方法返回一个 URI。URI 的字符串表示形式易解析且易出现编码错误，并可能导致安全漏洞。System.Uri 类以安全可靠方式提供这些服务。

trans-unit.source: Change the return type of method '{0}' from 'string' to 'System.Uri'
trans-unit.target: 将方法“{0}”的返回类型从 "string" 更改为 "System.Uri"

trans-unit.source: URI-like properties should not be strings
trans-unit.target: 类 URI 属性不应是字符串

trans-unit.source: This rule assumes that the property represents a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). A string representation of a URI is prone to parsing and encoding errors, and can lead to security vulnerabilities. The System.Uri class provides these services in a safe and secure manner.
trans-unit.target: 此规则假定属性表示统一资源标识符(URI)。URI 的字符串表示形式易解析且易出现编码错误，并可能导致安全漏洞。System.Uri 类以安全可靠方式提供这些服务。

trans-unit.source: Change the type of property '{0}' from 'string' to 'System.Uri'
trans-unit.target: 将属性“{0}”的类型从 "string" 更改为 "System.Uri"

trans-unit.source: Implement IDisposable Correctly
trans-unit.target: 正确实现 IDisposable

trans-unit.source: All IDisposable types should implement the Dispose pattern correctly.
trans-unit.target: 所有 IDisposable 类型都应正确实现 Dispose 模式。

trans-unit.source: Remove IDisposable from the list of interfaces implemented by '{0}' as it is already implemented by base type '{1}'
trans-unit.target: 从“{0}”实现的接口列表中删除 IDisposable，因为它已由基类型“{1}”实现

trans-unit.source: Remove '{0}', override Dispose(bool disposing), and put the dispose logic in the code path where 'disposing' is true
trans-unit.target: 删除“{0}”，替代 Dispose(bool disposing)，并在 "disposing" 为 true 的代码路径中加入释放逻辑

trans-unit.source: Ensure that '{0}' is declared as public and sealed
trans-unit.target: 确保“{0}”声明为公开且已密封

trans-unit.source: Rename '{0}' to 'Dispose' and ensure that it is declared as public and sealed
trans-unit.target: 将“{0}”重命名为 "Dispose"，并确保其声明为公共且已密封

trans-unit.source: Ensure that '{0}' is declared as protected, virtual, and unsealed
trans-unit.target: 确保将“{0}”声明为受保护、虚拟和未密封

trans-unit.source: Modify '{0}' so that it calls Dispose(true), then calls GC.SuppressFinalize on the current object instance ('this' or 'Me' in Visual Basic), and then returns
trans-unit.target: 修改“{0}”，使其调用 Dispose(true)，再对当前对象实例调用 GC.SuppressFinalize (Visual Basic 中的“此项”或“我”)，然后返回

trans-unit.source: Modify '{0}' so that it calls Dispose(false) and then returns
trans-unit.target: 修改“{0}”，使其调用 Dispose(false)，然后再返回

trans-unit.source: Provide an overridable implementation of Dispose(bool) on '{0}' or mark the type as sealed. A call to Dispose(false) should only clean up native resources. A call to Dispose(true) should clean up both managed and native resources.
trans-unit.target: 对 {0} 提供 Dispose(bool) 的可重写实现或将该类型标记为“已密封”。对 Dispose(false) 的调用应仅清理本机资源。对 Dispose(true) 的调用应同时清理托管资源和本机资源。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions should be public
trans-unit.target: 异常应该是公共的

trans-unit.source: An internal exception is visible only inside its own internal scope. After the exception falls outside the internal scope, only the base exception can be used to catch the exception. If the internal exception is inherited from T:System.Exception, T:System.SystemException, or T:System.ApplicationException, the external code will not have sufficient information to know what to do with the exception.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常仅在其内部范围内可见。在异常超出内部范围后，只能使用基异常来捕获异常。如果内部异常继承自 T:System.Exception、T:System.SystemException 或 T:System.ApplicationException，则外部代码将不具有足够的信息用于处理异常。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions should be public
trans-unit.target: 异常应该是公共的

trans-unit.source: Do not raise exceptions in unexpected locations
trans-unit.target: 不要在意外的位置引发异常

trans-unit.source: A method that is not expected to throw exceptions throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 预计不会引发异常的方法引发了异常。

trans-unit.source: {0} creates an exception of type {1}, an exception type that should not be raised in a property. If this exception instance might be raised, use a different exception type, convert this property into a method, or change this property's logic so that it no longer raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: {0} 创建 {1} 类型的异常，该异常类型不应当在属性中引发。如果有可能会引发此异常实例，请使用其他异常类型，将该属性转换为方法，或者更改该属性的逻辑，使它不再引发异常。

trans-unit.source: {0} creates an exception of type {1}, an exception type that should not be raised in this type of method. If this exception instance might be raised, either use a different exception type or change this method's logic so that it no longer raises an exception.

trans-unit.source: Identifiers should not contain underscores
trans-unit.target: 标识符不应包含下划线

trans-unit.source: By convention, identifier names do not contain the underscore (_) character. This rule checks namespaces, types, members, and parameters.

trans-unit.source: Identifiers should have correct suffix
trans-unit.target: 标识符应具有正确的后缀

trans-unit.source: By convention, the names of types that extend certain base types or that implement certain interfaces, or types that are derived from these types, have a suffix that is associated with the base type or interface.
trans-unit.target: 按照惯例，扩展某些基类型或实现某些接口的类型，或者派生自这些类型的类型，其名称都具有一个与基类型或接口相关的后缀。

trans-unit.source: Rename {0} to end in '{1}'
trans-unit.target: 重命名 {0}，使其以“{1}”结尾

trans-unit.source: Identifiers should not have incorrect suffix
trans-unit.target: 标识符应采用正确的后缀

trans-unit.source: By convention, only the names of types that extend certain base types or that implement certain interfaces, or types that are derived from these types, should end with specific reserved suffixes. Other type names should not use these reserved suffixes.
trans-unit.target: 按照惯例，只有扩展某些基类型或实现某些接口的类型，或者派生自这些类型的类型，其名称才应以保留的特定后缀结尾。其他类型名称不应使用这些保留的后缀。

trans-unit.source: Rename type name {0} so that it does not end in '{1}'
trans-unit.target: 重命名类型名称 {0}，使其不以“{1}”结尾

trans-unit.source: Either replace the suffix '{0}' in member name {1} with the suggested numeric alternate '2' or provide a more meaningful suffix that distinguishes it from the member it replaces
trans-unit.target: 要么将成员名称 {1} 中的后缀“{0}”替换为所建议的数值“2”，要么提供一个更能体现其意义的后缀，将它与它所替换的成员区分开来

trans-unit.source: Either replace the suffix '{0}' in type name {1} with the suggested numeric alternate '2' or provide a more meaningful suffix that distinguishes it from the type it replaces
trans-unit.target: 要么将类型名称 {1} 中的后缀“{0}”替换为所建议的数值“2”，要么提供一个更能体现其意义的后缀，将它与它所替换的类型区分开来

trans-unit.source: Either replace the suffix '{0}' in member name '{1}' with the suggested alternate '{2}' or remove the suffix completely
trans-unit.target: 要么将成员名称“{1}”中的后缀“{0}”替换为所建议的数值“{2}”，要么完全删除后缀

trans-unit.source: Identifiers should not match keywords
trans-unit.target: 标识符不应与关键字匹配

trans-unit.source: A namespace name or a type name matches a reserved keyword in a programming language. Identifiers for namespaces and types should not match keywords that are defined by languages that target the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 命名空间名称或类型名称与编程语言中保留的关键字相匹配。命名空间和类型的标识符不应与目标为公共语言运行时的语言所定义的关键字相匹配。

trans-unit.source: In virtual/interface member {0}, rename parameter {1} so that it no longer conflicts with the reserved language keyword '{2}'. Using a reserved keyword as the name of a parameter on a virtual/interface member makes it harder for consumers in other languages to override/implement the member.
trans-unit.target: 在虚拟/接口成员 {0} 中，重命名参数 {1}，使它不再与保留的语言关键字“{2}”冲突。如果使用保留的关键字作为虚拟/接口成员上参数的名称，则会使其他语言的使用者很难重写/实现该成员。

trans-unit.source: Rename virtual/interface member {0} so that it no longer conflicts with the reserved language keyword '{1}'. Using a reserved keyword as the name of a virtual/interface member makes it harder for consumers in other languages to override/implement the member.
trans-unit.target: 重命名虚拟/接口成员 {0}，使它不再与保留的语言关键字“{1}”冲突。如果使用保留的关键字作为虚拟/接口成员的名称，则会使其他语言的使用者很难重写/实现该成员。

trans-unit.source: Rename type {0} so that it no longer conflicts with the reserved language keyword '{1}'. Using a reserved keyword as the name of a type makes it harder for consumers in other languages to use the type.
trans-unit.target: 重命名类型 {0}，使它不再与保留的语言关键字“{1}”冲突。如果使用保留的关键字作为类型的名称，则会使其他语言的使用者很难使用该类型。

trans-unit.source: Rename namespace {0} so that it no longer conflicts with the reserved language keyword '{1}'. Using a reserved keyword as the name of a namespace makes it harder for consumers in other languages to use the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 重命名命名空间 {0}，使它不再与保留的语言关键字“{1}”冲突。如果使用保留的关键字作为命名空间的名称，则会使其他语言的使用者很难使用该命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Property names should not match get methods
trans-unit.target: 属性名不应与 get 方法匹配

trans-unit.source: The name of a public or protected member starts with ""Get"" and otherwise matches the name of a public or protected property. ""Get"" methods and properties should have names that clearly distinguish their function.
trans-unit.target: 公共或受保护成员的名称以 "Get" 开头，否则与公共或受保护属性的名称相匹配。"Get" 方法和属性应具有明确区分其功能的名称。

trans-unit.source: The property name '{0}' is confusing given the existence of method '{1}'. Rename or remove one of these members.
trans-unit.target: 由于存在方法“{1}”，属性名“{0}”会造成混淆。请重命名或删除这二者之一。

trans-unit.source: Type names should not match namespaces
trans-unit.target: 类型名不应与命名空间匹配

trans-unit.source: Type names should not match the names of namespaces that are defined in the .NET Framework class library. Violating this rule can reduce the usability of the library.
trans-unit.target: 类型名不应与在 .NET Framework 类库中定义的命名空间名称相匹配。违背此规则会降低库的可用性。

trans-unit.source: The type name {0} conflicts in whole or in part with the namespace name '{1}'. Change either name to eliminate the conflict.
trans-unit.target: 类型名 {0} 与命名空间名称“{1}”整体或部分冲突。请更改其中任一名称以消除冲突。

trans-unit.source: The type name {0} conflicts in whole or in part with the namespace name '{1}' defined in the .NET Framework. Rename the type to eliminate the conflict.
trans-unit.target: 类型名 {0} 与在 .NET Framework 中定义的命名空间名称“{1}”整体或部分冲突。请重命名该类型以消除冲突。

trans-unit.source: Parameter names should match base declaration
trans-unit.target: 参数名应与基声明保持一致

trans-unit.source: Consistent naming of parameters in an override hierarchy increases the usability of the method overrides. A parameter name in a derived method that differs from the name in the base declaration can cause confusion about whether the method is an override of the base method or a new overload of the method.
trans-unit.target: 在重写层次结构中对参数进行一致命名会增加方法重写的可用性。派生方法中的参数名与基声明中的名称不同，可能在该方法是基方法的重写还是方法的新重载方面产生混淆。

trans-unit.source: In member {0}, change parameter name {1} to {2} in order to match the identifier as it has been declared in {3}
trans-unit.target: 在成员 {0} 中，将参数名 {1} 改为 {2}，使其与已在 {3} 中声明的标识符匹配

trans-unit.source: Override equals and operator equals on value types
trans-unit.target: 重写值类型上的 Equals 和相等运算符

trans-unit.source: For value types, the inherited implementation of Equals uses the Reflection library and compares the contents of all fields. Reflection is computationally expensive, and comparing every field for equality might be unnecessary. If you expect users to compare or sort instances, or to use instances as hash table keys, your value type should implement Equals.
trans-unit.target: 对于值类型，Equals 的继承实现使用反射库，并比较所有字段的内容。计算反射价格昂贵，而比较每个字段是否相等可能并无必要。如果希望用户对实例进行比较或排序，或将实例用作哈希表键，则值类型应实现 Equals。

trans-unit.source: {0} should override Equals
trans-unit.target: {0} 应重写 Equals

trans-unit.source: {0} should override the equality (==) and inequality (!=) operators
trans-unit.target: {0} 应重写相等(==)和不相等(!=)运算符

trans-unit.source: Properties should not return arrays
trans-unit.target: 属性不应返回数组

trans-unit.source: Arrays that are returned by properties are not write-protected, even when the property is read-only. To keep the array tamper-proof, the property must return a copy of the array. Typically, users will not understand the adverse performance implications of calling such a property.
trans-unit.target: 即使属性为只读时，由属性返回的数组也没有写保护。为了防止篡改数组，属性必须返回数组的副本。通常，用户不会理解调用这种属性所产生的不利性能影响。

trans-unit.source: Properties should not return arrays
trans-unit.target: 属性不应返回数组

trans-unit.source: Override GetHashCode on overriding Equals
trans-unit.target: 重写 Equals 时重写 GetHashCode

trans-unit.source: GetHashCode returns a value, based on the current instance, that is suited for hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table. Two objects that are the same type and are equal must return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: GetHashCode 基于当前实例返回一个值，该值适用于哈希算法和数据结构(如哈希表)。类型相同且相等的两个对象必须返回相同哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Override GetHashCode on overriding Equals

trans-unit.target: 将“{0}”更改为公共接口实现。

trans-unit.target: 使包含类型“{0}”为密封。

trans-unit.target: 类型“{0}”是一个静态容器类型，但既非 static 又非 NotInheritable

trans-unit.target: 静态容器类型应为 Static 或 NotInheritable

trans-unit.source: Type {0} should override Equals because it implements IEquatable<T>
trans-unit.target: 类型 {0} 应替代 Equals，因为它实现 IEquatable<T>

trans-unit.source: Override Object.Equals(object) when implementing IEquatable<T>
trans-unit.target: 在实现 IEquatable<T> 时替代 Object.Equals(object)

trans-unit.source: Indexers, that is, indexed properties, should use integer or string types for the index. These types are typically used for indexing data structures and increase the usability of the library. Use of the Object type should be restricted to those cases where the specific integer or string type cannot be specified at design time. If the design requires other types for the index, reconsider whether the type represents a logical data store. If it does not represent a logical data store, use a method.
trans-unit.target: 索引器(即索引属性)应使用索引的整数或字符串类型。这些类型通常用于对数据结构编制索引，并增加库的可用性。对象类型的使用应局限于在设计时不能指定特定整数或字符串类型的情况。如果设计需要索引的其他类型，请重新考虑该类型是否代表逻辑数据存储。如果它不代表逻辑数据存储，请使用方法。

trans-unit.source: Use Integral Or String Argument For Indexers
trans-unit.target: 将整型或字符串参数用于索引器

trans-unit.source: Use Integral Or String Argument For Indexers
trans-unit.target: 将整型或字符串参数用于索引器

trans-unit.source: When an asynchronous method awaits a Task directly, continuation occurs in the same thread that created the task. Consider calling Task.ConfigureAwait(Boolean) to signal your intention for continuation. Call ConfigureAwait(false) on the task to schedule continuations to the thread pool, thereby avoiding a deadlock on the UI thread. Passing false is a good option for app-independent libraries. Calling ConfigureAwait(true) on the task has the same behavior as not explicitly calling ConfigureAwait. By explicitly calling this method, you're letting readers know you intentionally want to perform the continuation on the original synchronization context.
trans-unit.target: 当异步方法直接等待任务时，在创建该任务的同一线程中执行继续操作。请考虑调用 Task.ConfigureAwait(Boolean)以告知你打算继续。对任务调用 ConfigureAwait(false)以将继续操作安排到线程池，从而避免 UI 线程上出现死锁。对于独立于应用的库，最好选择传递 false。对任务调用 ConfigureAwait(true) 的行为与不显式调用 ConfigureAwait 相同。通过显式调用此方法，可以让读者知道你有意要对原始同步上下文执行继续操作。

trans-unit.source: Consider calling ConfigureAwait on the awaited task
trans-unit.target: 考虑对等待的任务调用 ConfigureAwait

trans-unit.source: Consider calling ConfigureAwait on the awaited task
trans-unit.target: 考虑对等待的任务调用 ConfigureAwait

trans-unit.source: Append .ConfigureAwait(false)
trans-unit.target: 追加 .ConfigureAwait(false)

trans-unit.source: When a type T overrides Object.Equals(object), the implementation must cast the object argument to the correct type T before performing the comparison. If the type implements IEquatable<T>, and therefore offers the method T.Equals(T), and if the argument is known at compile time to be of type T, then the compiler can call IEquatable<T>.Equals(T) instead of Object.Equals(object), and no cast is necessary, improving performance.
trans-unit.target: 当类型 T 替代 Object.Equals(object) 时，该实现必须在执行比较前将 object 参数强制转换为正确的类型 T。如果该类型实现了 IEquatable<T>，并因此提供了方法 T.Equals(T)，如果在编译时已知参数为类型 T，则编译器可以调用 IEquatable<T>.Equals(T) 而不是 Object.Equals(object) 来提高性能，并且无需强制转换。

trans-unit.source: When a type T implements the interface IEquatable<T>, it suggests to a user who sees a call to the Equals method in source code that an instance of the type can be equated with an instance of any other type. The user might be confused if their attempt to equate the type with an instance of another type fails to compile. This violates the "principle of least surprise".
trans-unit.target: 当类型 T 实现接口 IEquatable<T> 时，它向在源代码中看到对 Equals 方法进行调用的用户表明，该类型的实例可以等同于任何其他类型的实例。如果用户尝试将此类型与另一种类型的实例等同，但此尝试无法编译，则用户会感觉困惑。这违反了“意外最少原则”。

trans-unit.source: Rename to '{0}'
trans-unit.target: 重命名为“{0}”

trans-unit.source: A method in a base type is hidden by an identically named method in a derived type when the parameter signature of the derived method differs only by types that are more weakly derived than the corresponding types in the parameter signature of the base method.
trans-unit.target: 当派生方法的参数签名与基方法的参数签名之间的差异仅在于其派生类型比相应类型更弱时，基类型中的方法被派生类型中的同名方法隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Change or remove '{0}' because it hides a more specific base class method: '{1}'

trans-unit.source: Do not hide base class methods
trans-unit.target: 不要隐藏基类方法

trans-unit.target: 删除“{0}”并将其用法替换为泛型的 EventHandler，例如 EventHandler<T>，其中 T 是有效的 EventArgs

trans-unit.target: 更改事件“{0}”以将类型“{1}”替换为泛型 EventHandler，例如 EventHandler<T>，其中 T 是有效的 EventArgs

trans-unit.source: A delegate that handles a public or protected event does not have the correct signature, return type, or parameter names.

trans-unit.source: Change the event '{0}' to use a generic EventHandler by defining the event type explicitly, for e.g. Event MyEvent As EventHandler(Of MyEventArgs).

trans-unit.source: A type contains an event that declares an EventHandler delegate that returns void, whose signature contains two parameters (the first an object and the second a type that is assignable to EventArgs), and the containing assembly targets Microsoft .NET Framework?2.0.
trans-unit.target: 类型包含一个声明 EventHandler 委托返回 void 的事件，其签名包含两个参数(第一个参数为对象，第二个参数为分配给 EventArgs 的类型)，且包含程序集的目标为 Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0。

trans-unit.source: {0} should define operator(s) '{1}' and Equals since it implements IComparable
trans-unit.target: 由于 {0} 实现 IComparable，因此它应定义“{1}”运算符和等于运算符

trans-unit.source: Avoid using cref tags with a prefix
trans-unit.target: 避免将 cref 标记与前缀结合使用

trans-unit.source: Use of cref tags with prefixes should be avoided, since it prevents the compiler from verifying references and the IDE from updating references during refactorings. It is permissible to suppress this error at a single documentation site if the cref must use a prefix because the type being mentioned is not findable by the compiler. For example, if a cref is mentioning a special attribute in the full framework but you're in a file that compiles against the portable framework, or if you want to reference a type at higher layer of Roslyn, you should suppress the error. You should not suppress the error just because you want to take a shortcut and avoid using the full syntax.
trans-unit.target: 应避免将 cref 标记与前缀结合使用，因为在重构过程中，这种做法会阻止编译器验证引用并阻止 IDE 更新引用。如果由于编译器无法找到所提到的类型而导致 cref 必须使用前缀，则可以在一个文档站点取消此错误。例如，如果 cref 在完整框架中提到某一特殊属性，但你位于使用可移植框架编译的文件中，或者要在更高的 Roslyn 层引用某个类型，则应取消此错误。但不应仅因为想走捷径和避免使用完整语法而取消此错误。

trans-unit.source: Avoid using cref tags with a prefix
trans-unit.target: 避免将 cref 标记与前缀结合使用

trans-unit.source: '{0}' is always '{1}'. Remove or refactor the condition(s) to avoid dead code.
trans-unit.target: “{0}”始终是“{1}”。删除或重构条件以避免死代码。

trans-unit.source: '{0}' is never '{1}'. Remove or refactor the condition(s) to avoid dead code.
trans-unit.target: “{0}”永远不会是“{1}”。删除或重构条件以避免死代码。

trans-unit.source: Avoid dead conditional code
trans-unit.target: 避免死条件代码

trans-unit.source: This rule measures class coupling by counting the number of unique type references that a symbol contains. Symbols that have a high degree of class coupling can be difficult to maintain. It is a good practice to have types and methods that exhibit low coupling and high cohesion. To fix this violation, try to redesign the code to reduce the number of types to which it is coupled.
trans-unit.target: 该规则通过计算符号包含的唯一类型引用的数量来度量类耦合。具有高度类耦合的符号很难维护。一种好的做法是采用耦合性低且内聚性高的类型和方法。要纠正该违反行为，请尝试重新设计代码，以减少耦合类型的数量。

trans-unit.source: '{0}' is coupled with '{1}' different types from '{2}' different namespaces. Rewrite or refactor the code to decrease its class coupling below '{3}'.
trans-unit.target: “{0}”与“{2}”不同命名空间中的“{1}”不同类型相耦合。请重写或重构代码，将其类耦合数降低到“{3}”之下。

trans-unit.source: Avoid excessive class coupling
trans-unit.target: 避免过度的类耦合

trans-unit.source: Cyclomatic complexity measures the number of linearly independent paths through the method, which is determined by the number and complexity of conditional branches. A low cyclomatic complexity generally indicates a method that is easy to understand, test, and maintain. The cyclomatic complexity is calculated from a control flow graph of the method and is given as follows: `cyclomatic complexity = the number of edges - the number of nodes + 1`, where a node represents a logic branch point and an edge represents a line between nodes.
trans-unit.target: 圈复杂度通过此方法测量线性独立路径的数量，它由条件分支的数量和复杂度决定。低圈复杂度通常表示易于理解、测试和维护的方法。圈复杂度是由该方法的控制流图形计算得出，并如下给出:“圈复杂度 = 边缘数 - 节点数 + 1”，其中节点表示逻辑分支点，边缘表示节点之间的行。

trans-unit.source: '{0}' has a cyclomatic complexity of '{1}'. Rewrite or refactor the code to decrease its complexity below '{2}'.
trans-unit.target: “{0}”的圈复杂度为“{1}”。请重写或重构代码以将其复杂度降低到“{2}”以下。

trans-unit.source: Avoid excessive complexity
trans-unit.target: 避免过度复杂性

trans-unit.source: Deeply nested type hierarchies can be difficult to follow, understand, and maintain. This rule limits analysis to hierarchies in the same module. To fix a violation of this rule, derive the type from a base type that is less deep in the inheritance hierarchy or eliminate some of the intermediate base types.
trans-unit.target: 很难跟踪、理解和维护深度嵌套的类型层次结构。该规则将分析限制在同一模块内的层次结构中。要纠正违反此规则的情况，请从继承层次结构中不太深入的基类中派生类型，或者删除部分中间基类型。

trans-unit.source: '{0}' has an object hierarchy '{1}' levels deep within the defining module. If possible, eliminate base classes within the hierarchy to decrease its hierarchy level below '{2}': '{3}'.
trans-unit.target: “{0}”的对象层次结构在定义模块内的深度为“{1}” 层。如有可能，请消除层次结构中的基类，将其层次结构级别降到“{2}”以下:“{3}”。

trans-unit.source: Avoid excessive inheritance
trans-unit.target: 避免过度继承

trans-unit.source: The maintainability index is calculated by using the following metrics: lines of code, program volume, and cyclomatic complexity. Program volume is a measure of the difficulty of understanding of a symbol that is based on the number of operators and operands in the code. Cyclomatic complexity is a measure of the structural complexity of the type or method. A low maintainability index indicates that code is probably difficult to maintain and would be a good candidate to redesign.
trans-unit.target: 使用以下指标计算可维护性指数: 行代码、程序量和圈复杂度。程序量是基于代码中的运算符和操作数数量来理解符号的难度的度量值。圈复杂度是类型或方法的结构化复杂度的度量值。可维护性指数低表示代码可能难以维护，适合重新设计。

trans-unit.source: '{0}' has a maintainability index of '{1}'. Rewrite or refactor the code to increase its maintainability index (MI) above '{2}'.
trans-unit.target: “{0}”具有可维护性指数“{1}”。请重新编写或重构代码，将其可维护性指数(MI)增加到“{2}”以上。

trans-unit.source: Avoid unmaintainable code
trans-unit.target: 避免使用无法维护的代码

trans-unit.source: Do not ignore method results
trans-unit.target: 不要忽略方法结果

trans-unit.source: A new object is created but never used; or a method that creates and returns a new string is called and the new string is never used; or a COM or P/Invoke method returns an HRESULT or error code that is never used.
trans-unit.target: 已创建新对象，但未使用过该对象；或已调用创建并返回新字符串的方法，但未使用过该新字符串；或 COM 或 P/Invoke 方法返回从未使用过的 HRESULT 或错误代码。

trans-unit.source: {0} creates a new instance of {1} which is never used. Pass the instance as an argument to another method, assign the instance to a variable, or remove the object creation if it is unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: {0} 创建 {1} 的新实例，但该实例从未使用过。如果不需要此实例，请将它作为参数传递给另一个方法，将此实例赋给变量或删除对象创建。

trans-unit.source: {0} calls {1} but does not use the new string instance that the method returns. Pass the instance as an argument to another method, assign the instance to a variable, or remove the call if it is unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: {0} 调用 {1}，但不使用该方法返回的新字符串实例。如果不需要此实例，请将它作为参数传递给另一个方法，将此实例赋给变量或删除调用。

trans-unit.source: {0} calls {1} but does not use the HRESULT or error code that the method returns. This could lead to unexpected behavior in error conditions or low-resource situations. Use the result in a conditional statement, assign the result to a variable, or pass it as an argument to another method.
trans-unit.target: {0} 调用 {1}，但不使用该方法返回的 HRESULT 或错误代码。这可能会导致在出错或资源较少的情况下出现意外行为。请使用条件语句中的结果，并将结果赋给变量或将其作为自变量传递给另一个方法。

trans-unit.source: {0} calls {1} but does not explicitly check whether the conversion succeeded. Either use the return value in a conditional statement or verify that the call site expects that the out argument will be set to the default value when the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: {0} 调用 {1}，但不显式检查转换是否成功。请使用条件语句中的返回值，或验证在转换失败时调用站点是否希望将 out 参数设置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Avoid uninstantiated internal classes
trans-unit.target: 避免未实例化的内部类

trans-unit.source: An instance of an assembly-level type is not created by code in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 程序集级别类型的实例不由程序集中的代码创建。

trans-unit.source: '{0}' is an internal class that is apparently never instantiated. If so, remove the code from the assembly. If this class is intended to contain only static members, make it 'static' (Module in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: "{0}" 是显然从未实例化过的内部类。如果是这样，请从程序集中删除该代码。如果此内部类只用于包含静态成员，请使其成为静态类(在 Visual Basic 中为 Module)。

trans-unit.target: 避免未使用的私有字段

trans-unit.target: 未使用的字段“{0}”

trans-unit.source: {0} calls {1} but does not use the value the method returns. Because {1} is marked as a Pure method, it cannot have side effects. Use the result in a conditional statement, assign the result to a variable, or pass it as an argument to another method.
trans-unit.target: {0} 调用 {1}，但不使用方法返回的值。{1} 被标记为纯方法，所以不会有副作用。请使用条件语句中的结果，并将结果赋给变量或将其作为自变量传递给另一个方法。

trans-unit.target: 使用 nameof 代替字符串文本“{0}”

trans-unit.target: 使用 nameof 表达符号名称

trans-unit.target: 不得将属性 {0} 分配给其自身

trans-unit.source: Do not assign a property to itself
trans-unit.target: 请勿将属性分配给其自身

trans-unit.target: 设为静态

trans-unit.source: Use literals where appropriate
trans-unit.target: 在合适的位置使用文本

trans-unit.source: A field is declared static and read-only (Shared and ReadOnly in Visual Basic), and is initialized by using a value that is computable at compile time. Because the value that is assigned to the targeted field is computable at compile time, change the declaration to a const (Const in Visual Basic) field so that the value is computed at compile time instead of at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 字段声明为静态和只读(在 Visual Basic 中为“共享”和“只读”)，并且使用编译时可计算的值进行初始化。由于分配给目标字段的值在编译时是可计算的，因此将声明更改为“常量”(在 Visual Basic 中为“常量”)，以便在编译时而非运行时计算值。

trans-unit.source: Field '{0}' is declared as 'readonly' but is initialized with a constant value. Mark this field as 'const' instead.
trans-unit.target: 字段“{0}”声明为 "readonly"，但它是用常量值初始化的。请将此字段标记为 "const"。

trans-unit.source: Field '{0}' is declared as 'readonly' but is initialized with an empty string (""). Mark this field as 'const' instead.
trans-unit.target: 字段“{0}”声明为 "readonly"，但它是用空字符串("")初始化的。请将此字段标记为 "const"。

trans-unit.source: Do not initialize unnecessarily
trans-unit.target: 避免进行不必要的初始化

trans-unit.source: The .NET runtime initializes all fields of reference types to their default values before running the constructor. In most cases, explicitly initializing a field to its default value in a constructor is redundant, adding maintenance costs and potentially degrading performance (such as with increased assembly size), and the explicit initialization can be removed. In some cases, such as with static readonly fields that permanently retain their default value, consider instead changing them to be constants or properties.
trans-unit.target: 在运行构造函数之前，.NET 运行时会将引用类型的所有字段初始化为它们的默认值。在大多数情况下，在构造函数中将字段显式初始化为其默认值这个操作是多余的，这增加了维护成本并可能降低性能(例如随着程序集大小的增加)，而显式初始化是可被删除的。在某些情况下(例如使用永久保留其默认值的静态只读字段时)，考虑将它们改为常量或属性。

trans-unit.source: Member '{0}' is explicitly initialized to its default value
trans-unit.target: 成员“{0}”已显式初始化为其默认值

trans-unit.source: Prefer jagged arrays over multidimensional
trans-unit.target: 与多维数组相比，首选使用交错数组

trans-unit.source: A jagged array is an array whose elements are arrays. The arrays that make up the elements can be of different sizes, leading to less wasted space for some sets of data.
trans-unit.target: 交错数组的元素为数组。构成元素的数组可以大小不同，使某些数据集的浪费空间减少。

trans-unit.source: {0} is a multidimensional array. Replace it with a jagged array if possible.
trans-unit.target: {0} 是多维数组。如有可能，请使用交错数组来替代它。

trans-unit.source: {0} returns a multidimensional array of {1}. Replace it with a jagged array if possible.
trans-unit.target: {0} 返回多维数组 {1}。如有可能，请使用交错数组来替代它。

trans-unit.source: {0} uses a multidimensional array of {1}. Replace it with a jagged array if possible.
trans-unit.target: {0} 使用多维数组 {1}。如有可能，请使用交错数组来替代它。

trans-unit.source: Mark members as static
trans-unit.target: 将成员标记为 static

trans-unit.source: Members that do not access instance data or call instance methods can be marked as static. After you mark the methods as static, the compiler will emit nonvirtual call sites to these members. This can give you a measurable performance gain for performance-sensitive code.
trans-unit.target: 不访问实例数据或调用实例方法的成员可标记为 static。将方法标记为 static 后，编译器将向这些成员发出非虚拟调用站点。这样可使对性能比较敏感的代码获得显著的性能提升。

trans-unit.source: Member '{0}' does not access instance data and can be marked as static
trans-unit.target: 成员“{0}”不访问实例数据，可标记为 static

trans-unit.source: Seal methods that satisfy private interfaces
trans-unit.target: 密封满足私有接口的方法

trans-unit.source: An inheritable public type provides an overridable method implementation of an internal (Friend in Visual Basic) interface. To fix a violation of this rule, prevent the method from being overridden outside the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 可继承的公共类型提供内部(在 Visual Basic 中为 Friend)接口的可重写方法实现。若要修复与该规则的冲突，请阻止在程序集外部重写该方法。

trans-unit.source: Seal methods that satisfy private interfaces
trans-unit.target: 密封满足私有接口的方法

trans-unit.source: Remove empty Finalizers
trans-unit.target: 移除空终结器

trans-unit.source: Finalizers should be avoided where possible, to avoid the additional performance overhead involved in tracking object lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 应尽可能避免使用终结器，避免跟踪对象生存期时产生额外的性能开销。

trans-unit.source: Do not call overridable methods in constructors
trans-unit.target: 不要在构造函数中调用可重写的方法

trans-unit.source: Virtual methods defined on the class should not be called from constructors. If a derived class has overridden the method, the derived class version will be called (before the derived class constructor is called).
trans-unit.target: 不应通过构造函数调用类中定义的虚方法。如果某个派生类已重写该虚方法，则将在调用派生类的构造函数前，调用此派生类重写后的方法。

trans-unit.source: Re-throwing caught exception changes stack information
trans-unit.target: 再次引发捕获到的异常会更改堆栈信息

trans-unit.source: Rethrow to preserve stack details
trans-unit.target: 再次引发以保留堆栈详细信息

trans-unit.source: Make declaring type internal.
trans-unit.target: 使声明类型为 internal。

trans-unit.source: Make declaring type sealed.
trans-unit.target: 使声明类型为密封。

trans-unit.source: Make member not overridable.
trans-unit.target: 使成员不可重写。

trans-unit.source: When an exception is raised in a finally clause, the new exception hides the active exception. This makes the original error difficult to detect and debug.
trans-unit.target: 在 finally 子句中引发异常时，新异常将隐藏活动异常。这样会使原来的错误难以检测和调试。

trans-unit.source: Do not raise an exception from within a finally clause
trans-unit.target: 不要在 finally 子句中引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Do not raise exceptions in finally clauses
trans-unit.target: 不要在 finally 子句中引发异常

trans-unit.source: Change to constant
trans-unit.target: 更改为常量

trans-unit.source: Indexed elements in objects initializers must initialize unique elements. A duplicate index might overwrite a previous element initialization.
trans-unit.target: 对象初始值设定项中已索引的元素必须初始化唯一元素。重复索引可能覆盖先前的元素初始值设定项。

trans-unit.source: Redundant element initialization at index '{0}'. Object initializer has another element initializer with the same index that overwrites this value.
trans-unit.target: 索引“{0}”处的元素初始化冗余。对象初始值设定项还有一个元素初始值设定项具有相同索引，它会覆盖此值。

trans-unit.source: Do not duplicate indexed element initializations
trans-unit.target: 不要复制已索引的元素初始值设定项

trans-unit.source: An externally visible method dereferences one of its reference arguments without verifying whether that argument is 'null' ('Nothing' in Visual Basic). All reference arguments that are passed to externally visible methods should be checked against 'null'. If appropriate, throw an 'ArgumentNullException' when the argument is 'null'. If the method is designed to be called only by known assemblies, you should make the method internal.
trans-unit.target: 外部可见方法会在不验证该参数是否为 "null" (Visual Basic 中为 "Nothing")的情况下取消引用其某个引用参数。应检查传递给外部可见方法的所有引用参数中是否有参数为 "null"。如果适用，在参数为 "null" 时引发 "ArgumentNullException"。如果该方法应仅由已知程序集调用，则应将该方法设置为在内部。

trans-unit.source: In externally visible method '{0}', validate parameter '{1}' is non-null before using it. If appropriate, throw an 'ArgumentNullException' when the argument is 'null'.
trans-unit.target: 在外部可见的方法 "{0}" 中，在使用验证参数 "{1}" 之前，它为非 null。如果适用，请在参数为 "null" 时引发 "ArgumentNullException"。

trans-unit.source: Validate arguments of public methods
trans-unit.target: 验证公共方法的参数
